# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
New-LocalUser -Name 'MicrosoftAccount\user1@outlook.com'
```

# Expected behavior

The command line should create a local user account and link it to a Microsoft Account

# Actual behavior

```powershell
New-LocalUser: Cannot validate argument on parameter 'Name'.
The character length of the 34 argument is too long.
Shorten the character length of the argument so it is fewer than or equal to "20" characters,
and then try the command again.
```

# Environment data

For information, it doesn't work with PS 5.1 neither...
